message.name: MedCouchDb_USERNAME_Description
message.text: Specifies the Basic Auth Username used to log in to the CouchDB server if necessary.

message.name: MedCouchDb_PASSWORD_Description
message.text: Specifies the Basic Auth Password used to log in to the CouchDB server if necessary.

message.name: MedCouchDb_URL_Description
message.text: Specifies the location of the CouchDB REST URL endpoint.

message.name: MedCouchDb_VIEW_Description
message.text: CouchDB REST view endpoint, concatenated to the end of the URL with a slash if necessary. Can be specified on a per foreign-table basis.

message.name: MedCouchDb_VIEW_DEF_Description
message.text: Specifies a new view, formatted as a JSON string, to be created on the fly and subsequently used. Only supported at the time of the server creation. Starts with "views" at the top level, then specifies the view and its map/reduce function.>

message.name: MedCouchDb_LIMIT_Description
message.text: Limit parameter passed to CouchDB to limit number of results returned.
